maqras.text: 26|111|Tamen shuo:“Yixie beijian de ren zhuisui ni, women zen neng xinyang ni ne?”
26|112|Ta shuo:“Wo bu zhidao tamen zuole shenme shi.
26|113|Wo de zhu fuze qingsuan tamen, jiaruo nimen zhidao.
26|114|Wo jue buneng quzhu xinshi,
26|115|wo zhishi yige zhishuai de jinggao zhe.”
26|116|Tamen shuo:“Nu ha a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi (xuanchuan), ni bi zao shi ji.”
26|117|Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de zongzu dique fouren wo.
26|118|Qiu ni zai wo yu tamen zhi jian jinxing caipan, qiu ni zhengjiu wo he tong wo zai yiqi de xinshimen.”
26|119|Wo jiu zhengjiule ta, yiji zai manzai de chuan zhong yu ta gong ji de ren.
26|120|Suihou wo ni shale qiyu de ren.
26|121|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban buxin.
26|122|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|123|A de ren ceng fouren shizhe.
26|124|Dangshi, tamen de dixiong hu de ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|125|Wo duiyu nimen, que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|126|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|127|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|128|Nimen zai gao dishang jianzhu yige jinian wu, yi gong youxi.
26|129|Nimen sheli yixie baolei, haoxiang nimen jiang yong ju chenshi yiyang.
26|130|Nimen chengzhi (tamen) de shihou, nimen shi hen canku de.
26|131|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|132|Nimen yingdang jingwei zhu, ta yi nimen suo zhidao de shangci nimen,
26|133|ta shangci nimen shengchu he zisi,
26|134|yuanpu he yuanquan
26|135|wo dique haipa nimen zaoshou zhongda ri de xingfa.”
26|136|Tamen shuo:“Wulun ni quangao yu fou, zhe duiyu women shi yiyang de.
26|137|Zhe buguo shi laoshengchangtan bale.
26|138|Women jue bu hui shou chengfa de.”
26|139|Tamen fouren ta, wo jiu huimiele tamen. Ci zhong dique you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban shi bu xindao de.
26|140|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|141|Sai mo de ren ceng fouren shizhemen.
26|142|Dangri, tamen de dixiong sa li ha ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|143|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|144|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|145|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou, wo de baochou, zhi you zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|146|Nandao jing rang nimen anxin di zai zhe huanjing zhong me?
26|147|Zhe li you yuanpu he yuanquan,
26|148|you zhuangjia he juyou xianxi de rou suihua xu de ye zao shu,
26|149|nimen jingqiao de zao shan zao wu.
26|150|Nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|151|Nimen buyao fucong guofen zhe de mingling,
26|152|tamen zai difang shang shangfengbaisu, er bu yifengyisu.”
26|153|Tamen shuo:“Ni zhishi yige shou guhuo de ren,
26|154|ni zhishi xiang women yiyang de fanren. Ni yingdang zhaoshi yige jixiang, ruguo ni shi chengshi de.”
26|155|Ta shuo:“Zhe shi yi zhi mu tuo, ta ying de yibufen yinliao, nimen ying de mou ding ri de yibufen yinliao.
26|156|Nimen buke shanghai ta, fouze, jiang zaoshou zhongda ri de chengfa.”
26|157|Dan tamen zaile ta, suihou, tamen shen jue huihen.
26|158|Dan tamen haishi shoule chengfa, ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bu xindao.
26|159|Ni de zhu, que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|160|Lu te de zongzu, ceng fouren shizhe.
26|161|Dangri, tamen de dixiong lu te ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|162|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|163|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|164|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
26|165|Nimen zenme yao yu zhongren zhong de nanxing jiaojie,
26|166|er sheqi nimen de zhu wei nimen chuangzao de qizi ni? Qishi, nimen shi fanzui de minzhong.”
26|167|Tamen shuo:“Lu te a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi, ni bi zao fangzhu.”
26|168|Ta shuo:“Wo dique tonghen nimen de xingwei.
26|169|Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zhengjiu wo he wo de jiashu, shi women tuoli tamen de xingwei.”
26|170|Wo jiu zhengjiule ta he ta de quanjia.
26|171|Zhiyou yige lao fu ren chuwai, ta shuyu liu xia de ren.
26|172|Ranhou, wo huimiele qiyu de ren.
26|173|Wo jiangyu qu shang tamen, bei jinggao zhe suo zao de yu zai, zhen elie!
26|174|Ci zhong que you yige jixiang, dan tamen daban bushi xindao de.
26|175|Ni de zhu que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi ci de.
26|176|Conglin de jumin, ceng fouren shizhe.
26|177|Dangri, shu a bo ceng dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zenme bu jingwei ne?
26|178|Wo duiyu nimen que shi yige zhongshi de shizhe.
26|179|Gu nimen yingdang jingwei an la, yingdang fucong wo.
26|180|Wo bu wei chuanda shiming er xiang nimen suoqu renhe baochou; wo de baochou, zhi gui zhong shijie de zhu fudan.
